title: The Forsaken Ones
description: I thought I’d found the answer to our prayers, but that miracle turned out to be a nightmare. Now my friends and family are dying and it’s my fault. I’ll do whatever it takes to save them, even if it means leaving my loved ones behind in order to hunt down the elusive Raven, the only man with answers. With Thane’s help I’ll travel this new and dangerous world, confronting dangers I never expected. If I'm not careful, I just might lose my soul, if not my life. The Chosen Ones Series: The Beautiful Ones: Free Short story Prequel The Chosen Ones: Book 1 The Forsaken Ones: Book 2 This books contains kissing, cursing and violence. It is best for ages 14 and up.
author: Lori Brighton
